Build the bridge between your email lists and revenue.

Sender.net has the power to close gap between subscribers and your revenue by taking your email marketing to a whole new level.

Take a tour Take a tour

Email marketing automation has never been easier to implement.

Create your own email marketing automation with our simple drag & drop automation workflows. Allow the email automation to do the job for you.

    Enable :
  • Drip Campagns
  • Welcome Email series
  • Abandoned cart emails
  • Any other automated email scenario you can think of

You can do all this without any unnecessery hassle. After setting it up, it works for you 24/7.

How does it work?
How does it work?
Sign-up for free

The email tool that is tailored for E-commence.

Forget about copy-pasting a product into your newsletter over and over again. Import all of your products with our Product Wizard. Simply paste the product's urL to your email template and all the other neccessary information about the product will be inserted for you.

Empower your E-commence with out powerful marketing tool that is at the same time extremely easy to use.

Let your subscribers know about your latest offers, transactional details, email, reminders, abandoned card emails, and whatever else you feel the customer needs to keep engaging with your company.

Sign-up for free

Free integrations with the world's most popular E-commerce platforms

Sender.net makes life easier. Integrate Sender.net with your E-commerce platform and setup Abandoned cart recovery emails, save your customer's email address and setup your automated workflows based on your customer's behaviour.

If you need a custom solution, the API is ready for your needs.

Our integrations include

Customer support is always there when you need it.

Customer support via Email & Live-chat is always there. We don't just direct you to a self-serving FAQ page when what you really need is a straightforward answer.

Sender.net provides full customer support for everybody, even those using the Free-Forever plan. It does not depend on how much you pay for the service. We definitely do not charge you for asking questions. We know that sometimes you just need somenone to help you.

Main features

GDPR compliant

All of our technical servers are based in the EU as well as our legal entities. We respect your privacy and EU laws.

Deliverability

Great email deliverability and dedicated IP's for our customers that have more than 50,000 subscribers.

Web push-notifications

For Free! For everybody. Perfect tool for sending instant announcements to your subscribers.

Subscribtion forms

Subscription form to grow your audience.

Mobile responsive templates

Superb looking on both mobile and desktop screens.

Unlimited

Unlimited Users for each element.

No long-term commitments

Export any data you need, cancel anytime you want.
